fa-menu/defaultOpenKeys.description: array with the keys of default opened sub menus

fa-menu/defaultSelectedKeys.description: array with the keys of default selected menu items

fa-menu/forceSubMenuRender.description: render submenu into DOM before it shows

fa-menu/inlineCollapsed.description: specifies the collapsed status when menu is inline mode

fa-menu/inlineIndent.description: indent px of inline menu item on each level

fa-menu/mode.description: type of the menu; vertical, horizontal, and inline modes are supported

fa-menu/openKeys.description: array with the keys of currently opened sub menus

fa-menu/selectedKeys.description: array with the keys of currently selected menu items

fa-menu/subMenuCloseDelay.description: delay time to hide submenu when mouse leave, unit: second

fa-menu/subMenuOpenDelay.description: delay time to show submenu when mouse enter, unit: second
